title: Matri Vani - Volume I
author: Compiled by devotees
description: A precious collection of Sri Sri Maa's teachings and conversations. This volume contains her divine words on spiritual practice, devotion, and the path to God-realization.

content.data:
The purpose of life is to realize the Self. That is the primary objective. Everything else is secondary...

Remember God under all circumstances. Make your daily life a constant prayer.

title: Mother As Revealed To Me
author: Bhaiji (Jyotish Chandra Ray)
description: An intimate and inspiring account of Sri Maa's life and teachings by her close disciple Bhaiji. A treasure trove of spiritual wisdom and divine play.

title: As The Flower Sheds Its Fragrance
author: Atmananda
description: Daily reflections and teachings from Sri Maa. Each page offers profound wisdom in simple, accessible language perfect for daily contemplation.

title: Sad Vani
author: Sri Sri Anandamayi Ma
description: मां के पवित्र वचन। आध्यात्मिक जीवन और साधना पर मां के अमूल्य उपदेश।

title: Death Must Die
author: Atmananda
description: Maa's teachings on death, rebirth, and the immortal Self. A profound exploration of life's deepest mystery through Maa's divine wisdom.

title: Words of Sri Anandamayi Ma
author: Compiled by Atmananda
description: A comprehensive compilation of Maa's spoken words on various spiritual topics. An essential guide for seekers on the spiritual path.
